name: Open House CRM
description: A professional grade tool for real estate professionals to manage their contacts, transactions, and other important business data. This project features a modular codebase making it useful for any business professional. Built using React, Material-UI, a context API, and a MongoDB database.

name: Together Against
description: In these trying times, it can be so hard to find a good way to compete with friends. Together Against seeks to bring back the spirit of competition that we all miss. Whether you want to play video games, plan a sporting event or play a tabletop game, together against is the ideal platform to show your friends who is boss! Built using Handlebars, MySQL, and Bootstrap.

name: React Employee Directory
description: An employee or manager would benefit greatly from being able to view non-sensitive data about other employees. Built with React, this page makes an API call to the Random User API to populate the employee data. That data can then be sorted by first or last name, ascending or descending, alphabetically. You can also search the list by first name, last name, or phone number.

name: GitHub Finder
description: Search github using an API to find user profiles. Built using react and a context API.

name: Notes App
description: For users that need to keep track of a lot of information, it's easy to forget or be unable to recall something important. Being able to take persistent notes allows users to have written information available when needed. This application can be used to write, save, and delete notes by using an express backend to save and retrieve data from a JSON file.

name: Pitch
description: Imagine you are hanging out with friends. Your buddy mentions a band he has been listening to. Another friend says she has heard of them too and you should check them out. What do you do? Add them to your spotify, maybe subscribe on youtube and then forget about this new band you might love because of the information overload of the modern world. Enter Pitch. Pitch allows you to search for artists and bands and get a bite sized chunk of what they are all about, including basic info, tour dates and their top youtube result to tell you at a glance if this new band is for you. Built using JavaScript, JQuery, and Materialize.

name: Burger Time
description: A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a custom ORM. Following the MVC design pattern, I've used Node and MySQL to query and route data in the app, and Handlebars to generate the HTML.
